content.text:
# King Yuan of Zhou

|p2=Zhōu Yuán Wáng |w2=Chou Yuán-wangKing Yuán of Chou |l2=The Primal King of Zhou
}}
King Yuan of Zhou (), personal name Ji Ren, was a king of the Chinese Zhou dynasty. He ruled from 476 BC to 469 BC. He was succeeded by his son, King Zhending.
See also
* Family tree of ancient Chinese emperors
